tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Revenue growth rate measures the percentage increase in revenue.

answers.text: R&D spending as a percentage of sales

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. R&D spending as a percentage of sales is a metric used to compare the effectiveness of R&D expenditures between companies in the same industry.
That’s not correct. Time to value is how long it takes new users to recognize the value of your product.
Return on investment (ROI) is a performance measure used to evaluate the profitability of new product development.

detailedSolution: Return on investment (ROI) is a performance measure used to evaluate the profitability of new product development.
